newsitem.title: USA: Digital Descriptor Systems in Swiss pact.
newsitem.headline: Digital Descriptor Systems in Swiss pact.

text.p: Digital Descriptor Systems Inc on Friday said Switzerland-based Monetary Security Group Ltd has agreed to market Digital's security products to Monetary's government clients in Asia, Africa and Europe.
Digital said the Swiss company, which prints stamps, banknotes and other government-issued paper, will finance the venture. Terms were not disclosed.
Digital, a manufacturer of imaging systems for government law enforcement and private security agencies, said its LiveScan fingerprint device will be rolled out by year end.
The device allows fingerprints to be imaged and processed with no contact between the subject and the device, the company said.
